TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web-server control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件显示允许用户登录到托管网站的用户界面。
在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码，介绍了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。 在切换到源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑到 Web 页的标记。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类提供设计时支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类属性提供了以下功能：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.ActionLists%2A>属性返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>继承树中每个级别的设计器的类。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>属性返回的格式设置中显示的方案集合**自动套用格式**对话框。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>属性返回的字段关联的模板组集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制和顶级<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>模板。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器创建关联的临时副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>来生成设计时标记。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类方法提供了以下功能：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法返回用于呈现关联的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>在设计时。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法返回的模板相关联的序列化的副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法提供用于呈现关联的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>在设计时时出现错误。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法用于移除属性、 添加其他属性，或者隐藏关联的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法将关联的区域设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>从控件模板的序列化副本。
## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类，以更改由派生的控件的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件在设计时。
该示例从`MyLogin`控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>。 `MyLogin`是一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。 该示例还从`MyLoginDesigner`类派生<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>，并应用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>特性`MyLoginDesigner`上`MyLogin`控件。
`MyLoginDesigner`重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法以使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>属性中可见**属性**网格在设计时。 它将替代<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法以蓝色的虚线周围绘制边框的控件，以使其盘区更明显，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>的属性`MyLogin`控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None>值。 它将替代<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法来生成标记为包含错误消息以红色、 粗体文本呈现的占位符。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类创建关联时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件或该控件在设计图面上的副本。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the designer action-list collection for this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.ActionLists%2A>属性所产生<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类中，将其添加到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>对象，它从获取<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.ActionLists%2A>基属性，然后返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AllowResize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AllowResize { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control allows resizing.
Docs.value: 如果控件允许调整大小;否则为。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.RenderOuterTable%2A>属性设置为`false`，该控件不允许重设大小。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AutoFormats As DesignerAutoFormatCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of predefined formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
Docs.value: 一个 ，它包含 的预定义方案。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>对象填充从 XML 编码的内部类的成员。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

Docs.param: A to which definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control are added.
Docs.summary: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.
Docs.returns: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>关联的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>对象，该引用的对象`regions`参数。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>基方法来生成用于在设计时呈现的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法的类中继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类，以更改由派生的控件的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件在设计时。 该示例蓝色的虚线周围绘制边框的控件，以使其盘区更明显，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>控件的属性是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None>值。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#4)]

block.para: 如果重写方法，则一定要调用基方法，因为它最终，通过几个重写后，调用上控件或控件来生成标记的副本。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion) As String

Docs.param: The for which to fetch content.
Docs.summary: Returns a serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated control at design time.
Docs.returns: A string containing a serialized copy of the template used to render the associated at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法创建一份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>对象关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件容器中的控件，并返回序列化的副本。
序列化的模板可以还原到这一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法。
`region`未使用参数<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

Docs.summary: Provides the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated at design time after an error has occurred.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 占位符的设计时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件呈现包含类型名称、 控件名和公告和描述错误的消息。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法的类中继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>类，以更改由派生的控件的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件在设计时。 该示例生成为一个占位符，包括错误消息以红色、 粗体文本呈现标记。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

Docs.summary: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可视化设计器调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法时它已准备好使用设计器来呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法和其基方法配置属性并设置所需的设计器的操作的事件。
`component`参数是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>与此设计器或一份相关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

Docs.param: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.
Docs.summary: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来隐藏相应的设计时属性在设计器实现，使用的各种控件属性和将属性添加到或移除属性**属性**网格。
如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>属性定义为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>属性不适用时对模板化的属性`false`因此这些属性不会显示在**属性**网格。
## Examples 下面的代码示例创建派生自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>，并重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法，以更改**属性**网格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件在设计时。 示例使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>属性中可见**属性**网格。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#3)]

block.para: 重写方法将属性添加到或更改设计时属性集合中的属性的特性。请务必在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderOuterTable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RenderOuterTable : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.
Docs.value: 如果该控件使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则;否则为。 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner>控件使用外部表容器来应用内联样式规则在标记中的。 可以通过将此属性设置为删除外部表容器`true`。 删除外部表提供了如何将 CSS 规则应用于由控件呈现的标记更大的灵活性。

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion, content As String)
public: override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region, System::String ^ content);

Docs.param: An that provides the name of the region to update.
A string that contains a serialized template for the associated control.
Docs.summary: Sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法将分析相关联的序列化的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>由指定的控件`content`参数，然后使用该模板将更新指定的控件的区域<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A>属性`region`参数。
<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LayoutTemplate%2A>的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>可以使用序列化控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
Docs.value: 一个 ，其中为 中的每个模板化字段包含一个元素。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>属性获取<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>对象从<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>基属性，，然后添加<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>对象，其中包含单个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>对象关联的布局模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>. <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>属性返回此<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>给调用方。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性始终为`true`，在设计器<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>属性返回的关联副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件来生成设计时标记。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>属性创建副本，方法持久保存的实际<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控件，然后分析保持的控件字符串。 复制的控件不会影响任何持久性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>。
如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性已被重写以返回`false`，在设计器将使用关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>自身来生成设计时标记，并对控件的设计时更改将保存在页标记源。

block.para: 您可以重写属性返回或以确定是否使用类级别标记控件基于其值属性。如果未重写控件将忽略。
